name: Super Qube World
description:
WARNING! RAGE GAME!

-STORY-
There is a land called Mellowlan, it is the home to many
creatures, most commonly to the Mellowians. A species
that are almost completely marshmallow based and can
take the form of other instances they consume. There was
one of the species only to remain. That said survior happened
to be a Mellowian cube named Qube. Qube wants to
protect the last of its planet left from an evil being named
Shadox, who's goal is to wipe out all Mellowians and
take the planet for his own to conquer and rebuild.
